Public defenders are often overworked and overlooked. At its core, my Equal Defense Act would ensure public defenders are paid as much as prosecutors, establish workload limits, and fund additional training. Counsel is a constitutional right — we must live up to that ideal. https://twitter.com/voxdotcom/status/1129363468468015112 QT @voxdotcom Kamala Harris wants public defenders to get paid as much as prosecutors https://www.vox.com/policy-and-politics/2019/5/17/18540359/kamala-harris-2020-democrats-public-defenders-prosecutors?utm_campaign=vox&utm_content=chorus&utm_medium=social&utm_source=twitter

I'm the son of an immigrant who came to this country without a nickel in his pocket.

Our family didn’t have much money, but I was lucky enough to get a good public school education.

The kind of public education I received can and must be a right for every child in America. https://twitter.com/BernieSanders/status/1129756537969242112 QT @BernieSanders I am proud to introduce my Thurgood Marshall Plan for A Quality Public Education for All. Thankful for our brave servicemembers this #ArmedForcesDay and every day. They give so much to keep our nation safe and we must honor their sacrifice by ensuring they have support when they come back home, including job training, health care, and mental health services.
Thank you to the brave men and women who serve to defend our freedom! #ArmedForcesDay http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D64ilkLW4AMfcTe.jpg

White Supremacists get charged w hate crimes. Muslims get charged w terrorism.

This is a HUGE difference. Hate crimes are underreported, deprioritized, + aren’t treated as seriously as domestic terror charges.

Yet in the US, Neo-Nazi violence far outnumbers Islamic extremism.

RT @JoeCunninghamSC I came to Congress to get things done for the people of the Lowcountry, and that's exactly what I'm doing. 
https://www.counton2.com/news/local-news/rep-cunningham-bill-to-lower-drug-costs-for-low-income-families/2007223876

When a mass shooting is committed by a Muslim, the crime is almost automatically labeled as Domestic Terrorism.

But when White Supremacists like Dylann Roof shot up a black church, or attack the Tree of Life Synagogue, the FBI declined to charge them w/ Domestic Terrorism.

Why? https://twitter.com/nowthisnews/status/1129057169234468864 QT @nowthisnews .@AOC made a great point about white supremacist violence and the label of terrorism http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1129036068844638213/img/n_ZMlMgho7cXWOi5.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1129036068844638213/vid/320x320/XWpdNdlkLGj1tvQd.mp4?tag=12

It meets key marks:
✅ Big enough
✅ Fast enough
✅ Economically stimulating for working people
✅ Acknowledges injustice + w/ an eye to make communities whole https://twitter.com/alexckaufman/status/1129000388215148544 QT @AlexCKaufman NEW: @JayInslee just released a stunning detailed, 15,000-word economic plan to decarbonize much of the U.S. by 2030 and revivify the labor movement by repealing right-to-work laws and making it easier to form unions.

Yesterday the House passed the #EqualityAct, which will enshrine explicit protections for LGBTQ Americans into law.

I’m proud to co-sponsor this in the Senate. We need to pass it immediately—progress can’t wait.

Black babies make up only 14% of the infant population, yet make up 30% of all infant deaths. That is unacceptable. 💳 Cap All Interest Rates at 15% (includes Credit Cards & all lending)
💸 Federal Student Loan Cancellation (for the past)
🎓 Tuition-Free Public Colleges (for the future)
👩🏾‍⚕️Medicare for All (no egregious medical debt w/single payer)

RT @joshfoxfilm Wonderful lunch in South Carolina speaking with @BernieSanders and @ninaturner and @CornelWest about clean water in America.  We must be good stewards of our water tables and fight for clean water as a right for every American! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D63YI91WkAMv6wF.jpg

All over America teachers are telling us that they should not have to work two or three jobs just to make ends meet.

When we defeat Trump, we are going require states to pay teachers a solid starting salary, and that includes cost-of-living increases.

It's not just Flint. People in Denmark, South Carolina, have not had clean drinking water for more than a decade because the state government pumped a dangerous chemical into the city’s water supply. We are here to demand action. https://www.pscp.tv/w/b7BKPzMyNzU3OTl8MXlOeGF2d2VCWm5LahGkVPpel14mgq1VQKEanvvTTMe4zzrleaTLYsONSetB

The @NAACP has been demanding a ban on for-profit charter schools and a moratorium on federal funding of new charter schools until we can ensure they’re operating with transparency and accountability.

I agree. As president I will institute that ban and implement that moratorium.

On Oversight, Chairman @RepCummings reserves a gratitude for those who testify after experiencing unimaginable loss:

“Thank you for turning your pain into power.”

Pain like this should never happen. To turn it into power takes a strength that many of us may never understand. ⬇️ https://twitter.com/newsbysmiley/status/1129838774664540161 QT @NewsbySmiley Trayvon Martin’s mom is running for office in Miami http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D63-X7GXsAAAquD.jpg

We cannot go back to the days before Roe v. Wade when women were dying from unsafe abortions. Women should be able to make their own choices about their bodies. And doctors should be able to provide care safely and without fear. Full stop.

Thurgood Marshall said that all children have a right “to an equal opportunity to reach their full potential as citizens."

In my view, the only way to accomplish that goal is to guarantee every person in our country a quality education as a fundamental human right.

Betsy DeVos is the worst Secretary of Education in the modern history of our country. We need an Education Secretary who is a fierce advocate for public education and working class children and works to integrate our schools—not who is doing everything she can to undermine them.

Celebrating my cousin Audrey Sol’s graduation today from ⁦@Baylor⁩ along with her proud Mom Bibi. Congrats!! 👩‍🎓 👩‍🎓 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D63U4FLWwAAhOZ6.jpg

If I'm elected president, we'll create a national minimum that must be spent per-pupil to educate our kids.

No matter where you live, whether your community’s property values are high or low, your kids' schools will be guaranteed a certain minimum level of education funding.

Thanks to the Connecticut activists who have made this victory possible. The fight for $15 continues until we can take it nationwide. This is a fight we can win. 
https://twitter.com/HuffPostPol/status/1129510044083642369 QT @HuffPostPol The Fight for $15 notched another major victory early Friday morning, when lawmakers in Connecticut approved a plan to implement a $15 wage floor across the state by 2023. http://huffp.st/VfNpQAy?ncid=tweetlnkushpmg00000016&section=politics

Our criminal justice system breaks down when public defenders are overworked and underpaid. That's why I introduced a bill to boost pay and resources from public defenders. https://twitter.com/voxdotcom/status/1129363468468015112 QT @voxdotcom Kamala Harris wants public defenders to get paid as much as prosecutors https://www.vox.com/policy-and-politics/2019/5/17/18540359/kamala-harris-2020-democrats-public-defenders-prosecutors?utm_campaign=vox&utm_content=chorus&utm_medium=social&utm_source=twitter

Out of 35 major countries the U.S. ranks 30th in math, 24th in reading, and 19th in science.

Let me be as clear as I can: as the wealthiest country in the history of the world there is no reason we shouldn't have the best education system in the world.

If we are a nation that can pay baseball players hundreds of millions of dollars, don't tell me we can't afford to pay teachers the salaries they deserve. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1129785253382557696/img/tRC5Z3y_gGKARsSc.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1129785253382557696/vid/320x180/u_KioRcVfGwFp9-w.mp4?tag=12
